long_description: Get your day started right with a cappuccino or a double shot of espresso in the REI Doppio stainless-steel tumbler. Double-wall, stainless-steel construction keeps your morning beverage warm; can also be used to sip on your favorite wine with dinner. Lid presses on securely; lid is not spill-proof but will keep sloshing spills to a minimum. Compact size is a convenient alternative to larger travel mugs; tumbler fits in most vehicle cup holders.
short_description: Get your day started right with a cappuccino or a double shot of espresso in the REI Doppio stainless-steel tumbler.
